Los_Angeles.The Talmadge:
The Talmadge is a historic residential building in Los Angeles, California.


== History ==
A house owned by Earle C. Anthony, built in 1909, was moved to Beverly Hills, California for the 1923 construction of this building. Upon its completion in 1924, it was owned by Joseph M. Schenck and his wife, silent actress Norma Talmadge, who was its namesake.
